title: Adults attending a classical music event in the past 12 months in the U.S. 1982 to 2012
summary: In general Share of adults has fallen over the Year.
Share of adults is roughly constant from 1982 to 1992, and lastly slightly decreasing from 1992 to 2008.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2002 and 2008.
The highest Share of adults, of value 13.0 was reached at Year 1982
Minimum Share of adults about 9.3 was reached at Year 2008
